name: Castle Run (Cuprotix)
description:
That's my second game i spent on it  a week on construct 3.

That's a little platform with 3 levels ,the duration of the game  is basically 5 minutes

WASD keys to move and left mouse button to do an attack

CREDITS:

Developer :Cuprotix 

Designs Me with my friend https://opengameart.org/

Music and sounds https://opengameart.org/

Kill all slimes and reach the secret boss castle fight him , win and go to the outside world ,good adventure.
